name: Origin Space
description: Origin Space is an action RPG. Your character is a pilot of a combat spaceship, a member of a long-standing feud between the Federation and the Cultists. Having defeated hordes of enemies in dynamic battles, change the course of history!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 2.3 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
